title: PinkChain
author: PinkChain
created_time: October 13, 2022, 10:20:17 PMLast edit: November 19, 2022, 05:31:05 AM by PinkChain
content: What is PinkChain?PinkChain is a Layer-1 EVM Blockchain Platform focused on DeFi, GameFi and Metaverse. It is the first PoW Blockchain to have Liquidity Mining and Staking, a greater alternative to PoW Ethereum. PinkChain is Scalable, Sustainable, High-performance Blockchain Platform and fully compatible with EVM enabling developers to build scalable user-friendly dApps at nearly zero cost. PinkChain ensures real decentralization using Proof of Work (PoW).ðŸ”¥ PINKCHAIN POOL BOUNTY ðŸ”¥PinkChain is hosting pool bounty for the mining pool owners. 10,000 $PINK coins will be distributed among top 5 pools having the highest hashrate from launch. Winners will be decided based on average hashrate per day for 7 days from launch. Team will take a daily note of hashrate of all participant pools at certain time and based on the record we will divide it by 7 to get the average hashrate. Top 5 pools will be distributed 10,000 $PINK coins based on hash ratio (Not equally). To participate please fill the form below and list us as upcoming coin so that your miners will be aware of this and they will be ready to direct their hashes to mine this coin. Feel free to contact the team if you have questions or need help.NOTE: For first 7 days pool owners should keep 0 mining fee for the miners to support them.âœ… Form: https://forms.gle/9vPr1dJf9bdoiz6UA âœ… ANN Thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5415634

comments.author: PinkChain
comments.body: Mining Pool Bounty Ends now. 10k PINK will be divided among top 5 pools.Winners of the bounty: WoolyPooly, Herominers, Coinhunters, Mining4People, e4Pool. Please send a DM to Spidey#9757 on discord with your wallet address to claim the bounty.
